caseTitle: Muhammad Zaman & others v. Government of Pakistan thr. Secy. Finance Division & others
tagline: The State Bank of Pakistan Officers (Pension-cum-Gratuity) Regulations, 1980 are instructions for the internal control or management of the State Bank of Pakistan and are therefore non-statutory. By virtue of the amendment made in S. 54(1) of the State Bank of Pakistan Act, 1956, the Bank can make regulations and approval of Federal Government is no more required.
